HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: img:NoiseMap|caption:Every activity or object that produces sound will generate noise pollution. Activate the noise map to see it. |caption:Loud, instantaneous noises can be mitigated when enclosed in a room, while the low, continuous ones are more pervasive. |img:SilenceNeed|caption:Colonists will get annoyed as nearby noises deplete their silence need. Low levels will lead to mood debuffs, and on the worst cases, the colonists will stop working to seek relief in silent areas. |img:Soothing|caption:Anima plants irradiate a soothing aura that can help colonists restore their sanity. |img:SoundSupressor|caption:With the proper technology, you will be able to build artificial silence fields. For that, download the Noise Cancellation mod extension on my Patreon page. It's available for anyone, just follow the link above or go to https://www.patreon.com/jptrrs.
